title.rendered: STEDI MCX10 MOTORCYLE LED LIGHT DRIVING BEAM

content.rendered:
Hyper Output Motorbike LED Driving Lights

LONG THROW SPOT BEAM

Building on our expanding range of Motorcycle auxiliary lamps, our MCX10 spot beam is our most versatile motorbike auxiliary that sits between the larger MCX25’s and the MC5 DRL Lights.

HIGH-PERFORMANCE SPOT BEAM

Designed with high-speed application in mind, thanks to the CREE emitter our MCX10 throw a narrow 10-degree spot beam with a minor amount of near-field spill, making them an ideal compact long-distance auxiliary. Expect 3 x the beam distance of your average motorcycle high beam.

ENGINEERED TO PERFORM

The all-alloy die-cast housing rests on 3mm stainless steel U bracket to ensure our MCX10 remain dependable 24/7. Polyester Powder Coat finish is durable and UV stabilized. The primary lens is an automotive class which we guarantee will not break from stone impact.

DETAILS

Motorcycles, Quads, ATV’s and Dirt Bikes notoriously have very under-powered factory headlights. Enter the purpose-built CREE USA 10 Watt LED Driving Lights specifically designed for this application.  Don’t let the 10 Watt consumption sway you, the 10 degree light beam produced by these driving lights will blow you away, the improvement over factory headlights is simply unbelievable.

KEY FEATURES

  • Ingress Protection Rating IP68 – Submersible up to 3m
  • Virtually Unbreakable PMMA Lens
  • Stainless Steel Mounting Brackets
  • Spot 10 Degree Beam
  • CREE USA LED Chip

SPECIFICATIONS

INPUT VOLTAGE DC 10-30V
AMP DRAW 900mA @ 12V, 400mA @ 24V
POWER CONSUMPTION 10 WATTS
LUMINOUS FLUX 1052LM
LED Cree  XML-2  LED Chip
CERTIFICATION CE, RoHS & FCC
HOUSING Die Cast Aluminum
COLOUR TEMP 6000K
IP RATING IP68
WORKING TEMP -45℃～105℃
WORKING HUMIDITY 10%~98%
LIFESPAN >50,000HOURS
BEAM ANGLE 10 DEG
DIMENSION（MM） 51.2 (D) x 61 (W) x 66.7 (H)
WEIGHT 0.205Kg

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 1 x 10w LED Motorcycle LED Driving Lights
  • 1 x Stainless Steel Mounting Kit.

STEDI MCX10 MOTORCYLE LED LIGHT DRIVING BEAM

Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
